unnormalised: **Manufacturing & Supply Chain: Vendor Audits Tightened Ahead of Festive Season**
normalised: **Manufacturing and Supply Chain: Vendor Audits Tightened Ahead of Festive Season**

unnormalised: Mumbai, Oct 26 – Manufacturing firms across India are intensifying vendor audits ahead of the peak festive season, traditionally a period of heightened demand and supply chain pressures. This year, focus areas include ethical sourcing, quality control, and adherence to labor laws.
normalised: Mumbai, October twenty-six – Manufacturing firms across India are intensifying vendor audits ahead of the peak festive season, traditionally a period of heightened demand and supply chain pressures. This year, focus areas include ethical sourcing, quality control, and adherence to labor laws.

unnormalised: "With Diwali just around the corner, and Onam having recently passed, ensuring consistent quality and timely delivery from our vendor base is paramount," stated Mr. Sharma, Head of Procurement at Tata Steel. "We're conducting rigorous audits, including on-site inspections at facilities in Gujarat and Tamil Nadu."
normalised: "With Diwali just around the corner, and Onam having recently passed, ensuring consistent quality and timely delivery from our vendor base is paramount," stated Mister Sharma, Head of Procurement at Tata Steel. "We are conducting rigorous audits, including on-site inspections at facilities in Gujarat and Tamil Nadu."

unnormalised: Several companies are leveraging technology, such as blockchain, to improve supply chain transparency. These audits aim to prevent disruptions and ensure products, like the spices used in popular dishes like biryani, meet stringent quality standards. Violations detected during audits have resulted in temporary suspensions and even termination of contracts for some vendors. Experts predict this trend will continue into Q4, with vendors needing to invest in compliance upgrades to remain competitive. The IIM Bangalore has also announced a short course on best practices in vendor auditing for industry professionals.
